resources.string:
My name is Pham Hoang Sang and I'm from Ban Me Thuot city. I\’m 20 years old and I\’m studying at the Viet Korea University of Information and Communication Technology. There\’re 5 people in my family in Ban Me Thuot city. Now, I\’m living in Da Nang city.

 I\’ve got lots of hobbies and interests. I like playing games with my friends and reading books. I like to read topics of finance and self-help. I also do a lot of sport - I particularly enjoy jogging and karate. I\’m a member of the karate club at my university. I'm also interested in the stock market.

 I\’m a funny person who always makes others laugh. I\’m sometimes a bit talkative. I\’m also a very optimistic person. I always think things will get better
